name: RollMeOut
description:
RollMeOut is a game where the player needs to roll the ball to the exit. However the player cannot control the ball directly, they instead control the angle of the board with WASD, Arrow Keys or the left joystick of a gamepad (recommended).

Grab the key and roll the ball to the exit, careful though, avoid the spikes and the lasers!

Checkout out the source code @ https://github.com/AlbertoLameira7/RollMeOut

All models, shaders and programming done by Alberto Lameira.

sound effect used for the key pick up: https://freesound.org/people/TreasureSounds/sounds/332629/
